name: Green Acres & Cherry Blossom Cottage

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This little B & B was an absolute dream. We stayed in the newly built cottage and it was absolutely perfect. The bed was so comfortable, the towels of the best quality (very important to me!!) the bathrooms a delight, the kitchen was so well equipped and Christine was truly fantastic. Nothing was too much trouble for her. The cottage was cosy and very warm. We catered for ourselves the first morning but the second morning we had breakfast served by Christine and what a breakfast. Anyone staying here would feel so totally relaxed. I really did not want to leave.
reviews.title: We loved this place and would certainly like to stay there again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: this was our second stay, and will not be the last. Christine is the perfect host ,nothing is to much trouble. quite and comfortable this must be unqiue for B&B having three rooms plus shower room, This is a must place to stay, with a great Breakfast. thanks Christine. Paul & Margaret
reviews.title: this is the jewel in the crown
Excellent
reviews.text: We recently spent a weekend in the B&B at Green Acres.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Cristine was the perfect host and provided us with a warm welcome (tea and cakes!) and an excellent breakfast at a time to suit you.
reviews.title: Our latest stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were also shown around the brand new self contained cottage that is about to open - it looks fantastic.
reviews.title: Excellent B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hospitality and accommodation very good,lovely area, with local pub within walking distance.
reviews.title: excellent accommodation we will be back

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Excellent breakfast and charming village to stay!
reviews.title: Best B&B we have ever stayed in.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Had a three night stay in the stunning new cottage. Superb accomodation finished to a very high standard,with attention given to every detail.Christine is the perfect hostess, and so friendly we felt we had known her for years. Beautiful countryside surroundings yet less than 10 mins from Harrogate. Cannot wait to go back as this is best b&b we have ever been to.
reviews.title: Home from Home

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What a fabulous welcome we received from Christine when we arrived. She had thought of everything to make our stay special including the most generous welcome pack of food that we have ever had in self catered accommodation. The actual accommodation itself is not only extremely comfortable and well thought out but, spotless and tasteful as well.All this in beautiful surroundings close to excellent walking country and the wonderful spa town of Harrogate.
reviews.title: excellent place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: this was one of the best b and bs we have stayed in for a long while, most welcoming
reviews.title: Awesome peaceful getaway

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Had a 1 week stay during February 2012 and found the cottage ideal for our purpose. Really well appointed throughout, the finish is immaculate with plenty of nice touches to make it a home from home. The bed was really comfortable, and there is no outside noise to spoil a good nights sleep.
reviews.title: Cherry Blossom Cottage

reviews.text: The cottage is superbly situated to enjoy the Dales and N Yorks moors, with Harrogate, York and Skipton all close by. Highly recommended for a short or long break, this is one of the best holiday cottages we have ever stayed in! Thank you Christine.
reviews.title: Green Acres Cottage

reviews.text: Just returned from a lovely weekend at this beautiful cottage. We would highly recommend it to anyone and the Queens Head Inn which is a 2 minute walk away does lovely food and beer too! Well worth a visit from anyone. Thank you again,
reviews.title: Nothing too much trouble

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed December 2011 for 3 nights. This was our first time staying in the B&B and it was such a lovely experience. We brought our 3 month old son with us and we were made to feel so welcome by Christine and Alastair. Beautiful furnishings, amazingly comfortable bed and tasty breakfast provided by Christine in the morning. We have already booked to stay in the cottage next door in August. The cottage is truly stunning, we were allowed a look round it when we stayed and it is perfect. Can't wait to return with our two older boys in the summer, they will have a ball running round the surrounding fields! Thanks Christine and Alastair we look forward to seeing you soon.
reviews.title: Cherry Blossom Cottage WOW !!!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Michelle, Jay and baby Jamie Johnson.
reviews.title: Green Acres

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Having stayed with Christine in her B&B for 6 years now, we stayed in the new Cherry Blossom Cottage this time. It was absolutely amazing! 5* luxury throughout . Christine has thought of everything to make the cottage so warm and welcoming. Quality furniture and fittings throughout made our stay so comfortable we didn't want to come home. As always, breakfast was first class and set us up for the day. Nothing is too much trouble for Christine and we are looking forward to coming back in April.
reviews.title: Cherry Blossom Cottage

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have been before a number of times but never tire of the place. Situated in a beautiful spot, Green Acres is an absolute haven of tranquility. As well as this, the accommodation is so well appointed and beautifully kept that I can't believe that you could find anywhere better. As if that were not enough, Christine is a lovely lady and nothing is too much trouble for her to help you have a lovely stay. She is a mine of information on places to visit and where the shopping is best. We always have a lovely time. While we were there this time we were shown round Cherry Blossom Cottage which was absolutely amazing. We were struck by the excellence of the fittings and the quality of the furnishings. I can honestly say that I have never seen holiday accommodation of such a high standard anywhere.
reviews.title: Green Acres

reviews.text: The warm welcome of our hostess, the comfort of the accommodation, the generous attention to detail - all made for an excellent stopover. And what an unusual bonus to have our own kitchen! Altogether a superb B and B.
reviews.title: We hope to be back

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have been visiting the Kettlesing area of Yorkshire for about 8 years now.
reviews.title: Green Acres B&B / Cherry Blossom Cottage

reviews.text: Kettlesing is ideal base for the Dales / Harrogate Show Ground.
reviews.title: Excellent

aka: Green Acres & Cherry Blossom Cottage Harrogate, Yorkshire
description: Green Acres Bed & Breakfast (sleeps 2) was established in 1997 and is situated in the quaint village of Kettlesing in the heart of Nidderdale, an 'Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty' within the Yorkshire Dales. The surrounding area offers dramatic and contrasting landscapes with panoramic views of lush green meadows, rolling farmland and sheltered river valleys. We are the ideal location from which to discover the countless delights of North Yorkshire whether it be for walking, sightseeing or exploring the area. We also have the added attraction of accessibility to Harrogate, York, Leeds, Skipton and many more historic sites of interest. We offer a service "second to none" which includes attention to detail together with a very high standard of comfort and cleanliness. Our aim is to make your stay as relaxing and enjoyable as possible. Cherry Blossom Cottage (sleeps 4) Newly converted in July 2011. The contemporary and stylish cottage is decorated and beautifully appointed to a very high standard with a natural decor, solid oak doors and quality furnishings together with fresh flowers and many other personal touches to make your stay extra special, whilst also creating a home from home atmosphere. The cottage is light and spacious and fully equipped for your every need.
